channel.title: CVE Feed for daanvandenbergh -- CAOS | Host Google Analytics Locally
channel.description: The latest CVEs for daanvandenbergh -- CAOS | Host Google Analytics Locally

item.title: CVE-2023-6637|2024-08-02T08:35:14.866Z -- daanvandenbergh -- caos%20%7C%20host%20google%20analytics%20locally
item.description: The CAOS | Host Google Analytics Locally plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'update_settings' function in versions up to, and including, 4.7.14. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update plugin settings.
